trans-unit.source: Provides methods that ASP.NET uses to invoke the application-preload feature in [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Fornisce i metodi utilizzati da ASP.NET per richiamare la funzionalit√† di precaricamento di applicazioni in [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Called by [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] to notify ASP.NET whether an application should be preloaded.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] per notificare ad ASP.NET se un'applicazione deve essere precaricata.

trans-unit.source: The unique ID of the application.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the application should be preloaded; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>per indicare che l'applicazione deve essere precaricata; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Calls [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] to get information that is required in order to preload an application.
trans-unit.target: Chiamate [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] per ottenere le informazioni necessarie per precaricare un'applicazione.

trans-unit.source: IIS calls ASP.NET through this interface, supplying a reference to an object that implements the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.IApplicationPreloadUtil> interface.
trans-unit.target: IIS consente di chiamare ASP.NET tramite questa interfaccia, fornendo un riferimento a un oggetto che implementa il <xref:System.Web.Hosting.IApplicationPreloadUtil>interfaccia.</xref:System.Web.Hosting.IApplicationPreloadUtil>

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET uses that interface later to perform a callback into IIS to get preload information for individual applications.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET usa tale interfaccia in un secondo momento per eseguire un callback in IIS per ottenere informazioni precaricamento per singole applicazioni.

trans-unit.source: The handle to an unmanaged interface in [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] that ASP.NET calls to get information.
trans-unit.target: L'handle per un'interfaccia non gestita in [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] chiamata da ASP.NET per ottenere informazioni.
